message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its high value and quality, we believe it's worth $100. Would you like to proceed with this offer?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your feedback. Based on the current situation, we would like to counter your offer with a price of $75. This is our best offer considering the value and quality of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $60. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $70. Can you consider that price?
We understand your position, Bob. Considering the value and our costs, we're willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer is $72 for the product. We hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but I'm still a bit above $70. I'm willing to go up to $68. Can you consider that price?

We've carefully considered your latest offer, Bob. In order to reach an agreement, we're willing to set the product price at $71. We believe this reflects the value of the product while accommodating your budget.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $68. I'm willing to meet you at $69. Can you consider that price?

We've evaluated your last proposal, Bob. In light of the ongoing discussion, we're prepared to offer the product at $70. We hope this aligns well with your expectations and brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $68. I'm willing to meet you at $69. Can you consider that price?
